name: Eggless Blueberry Muffins with Applesauce, Almond Milk, and Almond Flour
author: paula
summary: After developing an egg and dairy allergy, these are a good option. Sprinkle tops with sugar and cinnamon if you want a little extra sweetness.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Whisk almond meal, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt together in a bowl; add blueberries and stir to coat
Make a well in the center of the blueberry mixture; pour applesauce, almond milk, honey, and coconut oil into well and stir until batter is just combined
Pour batter into prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, 20 to 25 minutes
